Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The ocean reveals her fury. The water pressure pushes the sparse air in your lungs out before pushing seawater in, forbidding you to breathe.'}
{3: 'Darkness, coldness, and silence surround you, dragging you further down.'}
{3: 'You see shapes and figures flashing before your eyes.'}
{3: 'Living or dead, familiar or otherwise, faces you remember being to walk toward you.'}
{3: 'In your daze, you seem to hear someone calling you.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Co... me... hand...'}
{3: 'You feel a solid, metallic grip on your palm before a force pulls you upward—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg'}
{3: 'You escape the freezing water, breathing intensely, grasping for long-lost air. Bright, scarlet light casts away the darkness.'}
{3: 'You look up and find a giant red star encompassing your vision.'}
{2: 'A giant red star?', 3: '17'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's right. It's a sign that it's entering its last days.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami, wearing an astronaut uniform, stands next to you.'}
{2: "We're doing space travel this time?", 3: '21'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Would you like that, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's pretty magical.", 3: '23', 4: "I'm glad we're not doing it realistically.", 5: '23'}
{3: 'Ebullism, deadly radiation, and extreme temperature could have easily torn your body apart.'}
{3: 'Instead, you are breathing perfectly fine in space. That defies all common sense.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami has pulled some tricks so that you can move normally in space, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I've been preparing this for a very long time. The moment has finally arrived.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami looks at you, slowly extending you a hand.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant, will you come with Nanami for a ride?', 4: '1'}
{2: "You don't have to ask.", 3: '33'}
{2: "This isn't like you.", 3: '34'}
{3: 'Hearing that, Nanami pauses for a second before grabbing your hand tightly—so tight that you even feel a slight pain.'}
{3: 'The universe is a huge place.'}
{3: 'That is nothing new. You thought you knew this better than anyone else, having lived in Babylonia for so long.'}
{3: 'But you have no idea.'}
{3: 'With Nanami\'s "tricks," you get to witness all the wonders of the universe, and you cannot help but feel astonished—at first.'}
{3: 'Nebulas formed from cosmic dust, crystal-clear white dwarves, star-devouring black holes, and galaxies, clashing and merging together...'}
{3: 'But the most wonderful views become mundane when you observe them on the scale of the universe.'}
{3: 'Lights and shades from billions of years ago created this infinite cage, bounding everything within the speed of light.'}
{3: 'What you are seeing is but echoes of the past. You are perhaps just chasing phantoms.'}
{3: 'The images caught by your eyes are merely remnants from eons ago. You are like the insect trapped in amber, jettisoned across time, forgotten.'}
{3: '...Where does reality begin?'}
{3: 'The only things that ground you are the warmth you receive from your palm and the silver figure you see before you.'}
{3: 'As if noticing something, Nanami stops moving forward.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I think that\'s all the time we have for a "walk." Time for you to go home, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami's going to accelerate, Commandant. Don't let go.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Grip tightly)', 3: '54'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Um... Maybe a little less tight...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'The scenery before you turns blue as all the stars transform into red streaks when they go past you, merging into the crimson nebula behind.'}
{3: 'This is a "redshift," visible only when you accelerate to a certain speed. The blue in the distance signifies the future, while the red behind you indicates the past.'}
{3: 'The kaleidoscopic sight before you is bewitching, shattering any sense of dimension.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory334.png'}
{3: 'By the time your vision returns to normal, you find a familiar blue planet before you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Time to go back, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lets go of your hand and gives you a gentle push, sending you into the gravitational pull of the planet, and you fall toward Earth.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'A sudden panic arises within you, and you shout at the tiny figure.'}
{2: 'What about you?!', 3: '70'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is going to stay here, but...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl winks, acting like her usual mischievous self.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'You can no longer hear what she says clearly. Your mind crashes into a giant white light.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You feel your body swaying. A blurred figure shifts before you, and you realize someone is carrying you to the sofa as your senses return.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You're awake, Commandant! How do you feel?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Am I out already?', 3: '90'}
{3: 'Your final space journey has left you feeling uncertain still. Although the familiar sights of your office surround you, you cannot tell if you are back in the real world.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Of course. Look.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami grabs some documents from the desk and hands them to you.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'These are the files you were still working on. Do you remember?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami might have installed many scenarios into Maple, but it's still impossible to replicate the details of the paperwork that even you weren't expecting, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You take a closer look, and the progress made on those documents is the same as you remember. You are out of the simulation, it seems.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Well then, Nanami's leaving, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami says that as she drags Maple out the door.'}
{3: 'She sounded... contrite for some reason?'}
{3: 'But before you can ask her about it, Nanami has vanished from your door.'}
{3: 'Despite the many questions you have, you figure the proper thing to do is be patient and wait if she is not willing to disclose the truth to you yet.'}
{3: 'Heading back to your desk, you find a cup of steaming coffee.'}
{2: "Nanami has grown up, hasn't she?", 3: '105'}
{3: 'You grab the cup and take a sip—'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Caught by surprise, you spray the coffee all over the place.'}
{2: 'How much sugar did you put?!', 3: '110'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{3: "Nanami is searching for something among Maple's tangled wires."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hm... Where did I put it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: "Tips: Maple's connection port is behind the right handle."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ah, there it is! You're brilliant, Maple!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'Thank you for your compliment, Nanami. I recommend removing your screwdriver from the casing of my central processor unit, given that it is not where the port is.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hehe. Begin data transfer...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami must keep these memories safe and sound.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: "A question: Your storage unit also contains the relevant memories, Nanami. Why are you downloading Maple's data?"}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'Maple thinks that it is pointless and a waste of resources.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's not a waste, Maple. Everyone would do the same if they could know more about each other this way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'No one would care for their personal gain on this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'This?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You'll understand when you grow up, Maple!", 4: '1'}
